Job Posting:175774 - Position: S26 Computer Engineering Intern, TFE Service Team 175774 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 12/15/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 12/02/2025 03:26 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Province / State Country StandardAero Winnipeg MB Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Summer S26 Computer Engineering Intern, TFE Service Team 175774 Co-op Position Winnipeg, MB Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: Computer Engineering Intern, TFE Service Team Job ID: 8023 Build an Aviation Career You're Proud Of At StandardAero, we use our ingenuity and know-how to find solutions for the simple to the most complex challenges in aviation. Together, we get the job done and done well. Our stability, resources, and respectful culture supports you in building a solid career with a great team you can count on day in and day out for the long term. As a summer intern you will support StandardAero's Test Facilities Engineering projects. What you'll do: • Support the development, testing, and debugging of software applications. • Contribute to creating user interfaces (UI) and software tools for monitoring or testing systems. • Help with data analysis, including mining, visualization, and interpretation to support projects. • Document development processes, code changes, and testing results. • Collaborate with team members on various software projects and assist in troubleshooting issues. • Participate in special projects, provide general technical support, and follow all company guidelines and safety practices. Gain exposure to different aspects of software engineering, including development, testing, integration, and analysis. • Inclusivity Is Our Standard StandardAero offers equal employment opportunities for all. Our supportive environment celebrates diversity with no room for harassment or discrimination of any kind. We invite you to be who you are and experience our welcoming culture. Raising the Standard of Excellence since 1911 With over a century of proven excellence, StandardAero has become an industry leader in MRO services and customized solutions in the aerospace field. Our shared values and learning-based culture inspire our team to exceed their potential and power our customers' missions worldwide. With on-the-job training, advancement opportunities, and excellent benefits, StandardAero invites you to experience a fulfilling and meaningful career with us. #LI-AB1 Job Requirements Basic Qualifications: • Strong planning, organizational, analytical, leadership, interpersonal, decision making, oral and written communication skills. • Basic understanding of programming languages • 1+ years of experience with computers and MS Office experience/knowledge. Must have completed 1st Year of Engineering studies. Open to 2nd, 3rd year students. • Desired Skills • Exposure to software testing, debugging, or quality assurance concepts. • Basic knowledge of user interface (UI) design or front-end development. Ability to think analytically, solve problems, and adapt to new technologies. • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
